quest.Name: The Dig
quest.Accomplishment: You witnessed the discovery of and conversed with the Neurolith.
quest.Hagiograph: =name= held an accord with the Canyon Carver of old, and graciously agreed to carry its wisdom despite its past transgressions.
quest.Gospel: While excavating the vacant flats, =name= came upon a clan of worms carving a canyon. Because of =player.t's= precise digging implement, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: Travel to the Dig Site
step.text: Travel to Prozeman's dig site west of the Six Day Stilt.

step.Name: Attend the Dig
step.text: Join Prozeman and see if the excavator unearths anything.

step.Name: Report to Prozeman
step.text: If the excavator unearths anything, give Prozeman your account.
